Field Detail

$command

public string $command

Shows the last command that XML_XSLT2Processor attempted to execute on the (JAVA-)CLI interface. Empty by default and remains that way when another interface is used. Useful when debugging.
Available since version 0.1.3.

$options

public array $options = array()

An associative array of options for use in subsequent transformations. Unknown options and values will be ignored.
Available since version 0.3.0.

Method Detail

_url2filepath

private static string _url2filepath(string $url, string $base=null)

Turn a URL into a filepath
Because this package deals with the command line and yet aims to be as simple as possible, there was a need for a function to turn URLs into filepaths. This is this solution. It's not exactly a very good one, which is why checks are performed along the way.

Parameters

$url -
$base -

importStylesheet

public bool importStylesheet(mixed $stylesheet)

Import stylesheet
This method imports the specified stylesheet into the XML_XSLT2Processor for transformations.

Parameters

$stylesheet -

setParameter

public bool setParameter(string $namespace, mixed $name, string $value=null, string $mode=null)

Set value for a parameter
Sets the value of one or more parameters to be used in subsequent transformations with XML_XSLT2Processor. If the parameter doesn't exist in the stylesheet, or is in unsupported mode, it will be ignored.

Parameters

$namespace -
$name -
$value -
$mode -

getParameter

public string getParameter(string $namespace, string $name, string $mode='STRING')

Get value of a parameter
Gets the value of a parameter if previously set by {@link XML_XSLT2Processor::setParameter}.

Parameters

$namespace -
$name -
$mode -

removeParameter

public bool removeParameter(string $namespace, string $name, string $mode='STRING')

Remove parameter
Removes the value of a parameter if previously set by {@link XML_XSLT2Processor::setParameter()}. This will make the processor use the default value for the parameter as specified in the stylesheet.

Parameters

$namespace -
$name -
$mode -

transformToURI

public int transformToURI(mixed $xml, string $uri)

Transform to URI
Transforms the input source document specified by the argument to this function to a URI by using the stylesheet specified by {@link XML_XSLT2Processor::importStylesheet()}. If you use SAXON, you can also transform a folder of input documents with the same stylesheet to another folder where the output documents will be written. Note that both arguments must be folders in that case.

Parameters

$xml -
$uri -

transformToXML

public string transformToXML(mixed $xml)

Transform to XML
Transforms the source node to a string applying the stylesheet given by the {@link XML_XSLT2Processor::importStylesheet()} method.

Parameters

$xml -

transformToDoc

public  transformToDoc(mixed $xml)

Transform to DOMDocument
Transforms the input source document specified by the argument to this function to a DOMDocument by using the stylesheet specified by {@link XML_XSLT2Processor::importStylesheet()}.

Parameters

$xml -

getErrors

public static mixed getErrors(int $index=null)

Retrieve an array of errors or a chosen error.

Get all errors that occurred during the script's execution. Optionally get a single error, specified by an index. This function may be called statically.

Parameters

$index -

clearErrors

public static void clearErrors()

Clear the error buffer.

Clear the error log of all errors that occurred during the script's execution until that moment.

public void __destruct()

Destroyes the temporary files used by this class, if any.
